General.Name: Slj Global Tbk
General.Description: PT SLJ Global Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, engages in timber manufacturing, and logging businesses in the United States, Indonesia, East Asia, Europe, Australia, and Southeast Asia. It operates in two segments, Timber Manufacturing and Power Plant; and Logging. The company manages natural forest. It also involved in the plywood, medium density fiberboard, mining, and plymill and sawnmill businesses. The company was formerly known as PT Sumalindo Lestari Jaya Tbk and changed its name to PT SLJ Global Tbk in December 2012. PT SLJ Global Tbk was incorporated in 1980 and is headquartered in Jakarta Selatan, Indonesia.
